name: Hazmat Bay + Ballyhoo + Echo Movement 11/7/12 HELP SUPPORT GRASSROOTS MUSIC!
description:
Ollies/Revolution Amityville NY
Doors are at 7 pm. 16+ with ID.
Tickets are $15 each

This lineup is stacked!  Its going to be an autumn reggae party on Long Island! Ballyhoo! is coming off an epic Warped Tour, and Echo Movement has been killing it!  Check out Hazmat Bay in their last Long Island show of the year, as they continue to spread their music throughout the country!

Please take out the time to say Hazmat Bay at the door if you do not buy tickets from us online.  We are pushing this one really hard, and have a quota we need to reach just to break even.  

Tickets can be picked up day of show at Ollies (after 4pm), they can be shipped to you, or they can be delivered to you.  Please Email us at Hazmatbay@gmail.com if you would like to buy them in cash in advance!

*Take note you will NEED your ID to claim the tickets for will call, and the name on the ID needs to be the name on the account.

For more info message us at Facebook.com/hazmatbay
or Hazmatbay@gmail.com

name: Hazmat Bay Self Titled Album CD Version
description: Hazmat Bay's self-titled album is here! be prepared for 13 tracks of Long Islands best rock.
